mods.abstract: Page 102 of the album includes five photographs.; Photograph 1 [72] shows a man harvesting corn on a horse-drawn harvester.; Photograph 2 [20] shows a mature corn field ready for harvest. A man standing between the stalks illustrates scale.; Photograph 3 [73] shows corn stalk samples bound to a chicken wire background. A man with suspenders stands with arms extended to illustrate scale.; Photograph 4 [19] shows the tassel of a corn plant.; Photograph 5 [74] shows corn stalk samples.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
